sentence.Network_en: His name has cropped up at every selection meeting this season.

entry.def: Cropped items of clothing are shorter than normal.

example.ex: Women athletes wear cropped tops and tight shorts.
example.tran: 女运动员穿着短上衣和紧身短裤。
